system.description:
Effect: When declaring this attack, the user may freely move up to half of a Movement Score of their choice. The user gains @Affliction[choice-locked] 5 and attacks with and resolves this attack.

While @Affliction[choice-locked], the user does not consume PP when using this attack, and each declaration of this attack that results in at least one hit target doubles the Power of this attack.

The user is cured of @Affliction[choice-locked] if they miss all valid targets with this attack, or if there are no valid targets for it to select. Upon being cured of @Affliction[choice-locked], this attack's Power is reset to 30.
